) I-Drug

. O

very O

. O
This O
often O
leads O
to O
leg/foot B-Disease
muscle I-Disease
cramp I-Disease
. O
Comparable O
to O
fatigue O
after O
a O
long O
workout O
. O
I O
have O
been O
taking O
lipitor B-Drug
for O
about O
4 O
yrs O
- O
the O
muscles B-Disease
tissues I-Disease
tiring I-Disease
has O
become O
worse O
with O
time O
and O
now O
will O
'act O
' O
up O
very O
soon O
even O
with O
a O
short O
slow O
walk O
. O
This O
has O
severely O
hampered O
my O
ability O
to O
excercise O
. O
I O
first O
thought O
this O
was O
a O
response O
to O
the O
diabetes B-Disease

but O
was O

that O

may O
be O

soon O
after O

. O

fatigue I-Disease
/ O
cramping B-Disease
- O
hopefully O
this O
condition O
will O
reverse O
. O

Calf O
muscles O
( O
and O
foot O
) O
tire O
very O
quickly O
. O
This O
often O
leads O
to O
leg/foot B-Disease
cramp I-Disease
. O
Comparable O
to O
fatigue O
after O
a O
long O
workout O
. O
I O
have O
been O
taking O
lipitor B-Drug
for O
about O
4 O
yrs O
- O
the O
muscle B-Disease
tiring I-Disease
has O
become O
worse O
with O
time O
and O
now O
will O
'act O
' O
up O
very O
soon O
even O
with O
a O
short O
slow O
walk O
. O
This O
has O
severely O
hampered O
my O
ability O
to O
excercise O
. O
I O
first O
thought O
this O
was O
a O
response O
to O
the O
diabetes B-Disease
but O
was O

aware O
that O
lipitor B-Drug
may O
be O
causing O
it O
. O
lipitor B-Drug
did O
lower O
my O
chloesterol O
soon O
after O
starting O
it O
. O

does O
n't O
seem O
as O
effective O
now O
. O

going O
to O
stop O
taking O
it O
because O
of O

muscle B-Disease

/ O
